籤詩版本二:
U tlameha ho bua ka bolokolohi 'me u hopole hore u se ke ua batla litsebo tse ling libakeng tse ling.
U tlameha ho khomarela bophelo ba hau ba khale, ha ho letho le leng le tla u tsoela molemo
詩意:
Hexagram ena ke pontšo ea ho boloka nako le ho boloka nako.
Ho boloka lintho tsa khale ho tla tlisa mahlohonolo.
解曰: Phela 'me u lule. E lakatsehang ebile e atlehile. O seke wa etsa letho le sele. E-ba hlokolosi.
籤詩故事一:
◇Morena Wen o ile a kōpa bonohe
Morena Wen oa Leloko la Zhou o ne a tseba bonohe, Morena Zhou o ile a mo bitsa ka nako eo. of place) ho ya ka molao le ho se tswele kantle.
Hamorao, Morena Wen o ile a kenngoa litlamong tsa ntlo ke Morena Zhou ho Youli (lebitso la sebaka).
Ka nako eo, mora e moholo wa Morena Wen o ile a ya pholosa ntatae, empa a bolawa hobane a lebetse ditaelo tsa ntatae.
聖意: Ntlo ka boeona hangata ha e ratehe, ho batla leruo le mahlohonolo, thekiso, lenyalo, alamo ea Liujia, silika ea Chiti lintlha tse hlano, tšenyo ea liphoofolo tse tšeletseng, batho ba lahlehileng, nyeoe ea sechaba, ho falla, ho boloka thepa, ho lahleheloa ke thepa, boloetse, lefu le lebe, lebitla la Anshan le lokela ho ba teng. fetoha.
古人: Morena Wen o ile a kopa bonohe
第X籤: Lotho ea mashome a mahlano a metso e robeli
